payment.mailSubject: FlowMint Pro - Payment Completed - License Request
payment.mailBody:
Hi FlowMint team,

I have completed the payment for FlowMint Pro.

Please find my payment screenshot attached to this email.

Details:
- Plan chosen: (Weekly Pro / Monthly Pro / Quarterly Pro / Yearly Pro — please specify)
- Amount paid: (e.g. ₹99, ₹299, ₹799 or ₹2,499)
- Date of payment: (please fill)

Please verify and issue my Pro license.

Thank you.

plans.name: Weekly Pro
plans.description: Try Pro for a week. Full access, no commitment.

plans.name: Monthly Pro
plans.description: Full access to Pro features for one month. Renew anytime.

plans.name: Quarterly Pro
plans.description: 3 months of Pro. Save compared to paying monthly.

plans.name: Yearly Pro
plans.description: Best value. Save over 30% compared to monthly.
